title: SPECIAL: Bonus episodes of BattleWalks now available!
itunes:title: SPECIAL: Bonus episodes of BattleWalks now available!
itunes:subtitle: We are excited to announce that bonus episodes of our sister podcast, BattleWalks, are now available for subscribers on Apple Podcasts. Sign up on the Apple Podcasts app for a free 7-day trial to access exclusive bonus content every week!
description:
We are excited to announce that bonus episodes of our sister podcast, BattleWalks, are now available for subscribers on Apple Podcasts. Sign up on the Apple Podcasts app for a free 7-day trial to access exclusive bonus content every week!

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
